titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony in Kanelos v. County of Mohave, et al. and Zanna, et al. v. Mohave County, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/23/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes Gina Gormley, an employee of Senator John McCain, to testify in the cases of Kanelos v. County of Mohave, et al. and Zanna, et al. v. Mohave County et al., except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted.
